snippet: At least 88 people are dead and/or missing. The country has tried to upgrade its disaster-response capability in recent years but is regularly stretched by such catastrophes.
abstract: At least 88 people are dead and/or missing. The country has tried to upgrade its disaster-response capability in recent years but is regularly stretched by such catastrophes.
lead_paragraph: At least 88 people are dead or missing after an earthquake in the central Philippines in the strait between Negros and Cebu. [The Wall Street Journal]

headline.main: On Our Radar: Quake in the Philippines
